title: Panel should close when last containing connection/tab closes
author: CrazyOrange
body_snippet:
When the last connection/tab in a panel closed the parent panel stays open. Imho it should close or there should be an option for it.
Keeping open empty panels messes up the tab view.

I'm using version 1.77.1.27654 on windows 10.

comments.author: RickMay57
comments.snippet: That was a behavior that preexisted the current version, I would like to add my voice to this suggestion. It seems counter intuitive to a clean front-end

comments.author: GeriZ
comments.snippet: Yes, it would be better to close the panel after the last connection of this panel was closed!!

notes: Manual triage: Duplicate of #2126 (empty panel close). Already fixed in v1.79.0 PR #3126 - panels now close automatically when last tab is closed.
